text: Ara smarana karuna, yakhana musa tamra sampradayake balechilena, ‘he amara sampradaya! Tomara amake kena kasta diccha athaca tomara jana ye, ami tomadera kache allahara rasula. Atahpara tara yakhana bamka patha abalambana karala takhana allah‌ tadera hrdayake bamka kare dilena. Ara allaha phasika sampradayake hedayata karena na
